summary: Portland is Oregon's biggest city, located in the northwest of the state where the Willamette and Columbia rivers meet. With a population of over 650,000, it's the 26th largest city in the U.S. and the most populous in the Pacific Northwest after Seattle. The city was named after Portland, Maine, and was settled in the 1840s. It was once known for crime but has since transformed into a progressive, liberal city. Portland has a unique government with a mayor and commissioners. Its climate is perfect for roses, earning it the nickname "City of Roses."
title: Portland, Oregon
